snippet.title: Broken Sky Official Trailer April 2021
snippet.description:
This is the official trailer for Broken Sky.
Release date 12th May 2021
You can WISHLIST it at
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1439970/Broken_Sky/


Broken Sky is a fast paced dogfighting shooter featuring unlockable planes, weapons and special abilities.

Arcade action from the start. No boring, long winded missions - just fly, shoot and kill as many aliens as you can.
Use resource points to equip your plane however you want and go into battle against the alien hordes.
